name: I'll Cop Your Heart
description:
Try to cop (steal) as many hearts as you can!

Note: All hearts copped are taken in an aromantic way.

This is a simple minigame. Begin with the up arrow key. Play the game with the arrow keys, choosing the one in the direction of the red heart. N and M will toggle noise and music, respectively. Leave the game from the menu with ESC. Reset save data with R.

I made this game solo for Pyweek 31, a semiannual game jam. My goals were to actually finish the game and make something fun along the way, keeping accessibility in mind. All the art and code was created by me.

Link to pyweek entry and github repository.
